title: Add NetworkEnvironment type to DataModels
description:
attached_molecule: da-wisp-eut
attached_at: 2026-02-13T23:03:29Z
attached_args: Add NetworkEnvironment type ('production' | 'testnet' | 'local') and EnvironmentConfig interface to the data-models package. Export from index.ts. Add unit tests. This is a simple type addition — no business logic, just the shared discriminator type.
dispatched_by: mayor

Add NetworkEnvironment discriminator type to the shared data-models package. Type: 'production' | 'testnet' | 'local'. Also add EnvironmentConfig interface with environment and requiresExplicitProductionOptIn fields. This is an operational mode discriminator (not testnet-specific) approved by Enterprise Architect for placement in the Contract Domain. All downstream test network work depends on this.

title: Rebuild data-models dist with correct exports map (enums/AssetType missing)
description:
attached_molecule: da-wisp-hbs
attached_at: 2026-02-15T18:04:49Z
attached_args: SKIP PLAN MODE. Implement directly. Rebuild dist with correct exports map. enums/AssetType must be present in dist output. npm run build && npm test must pass.
dispatched_by: mayor

data-models dist build is broken — consuming rigs cannot resolve dist/enums/AssetType. Rebuild dist ensuring all package.json exports entries resolve to actual files. Verify with: npm run build && npm run test. Then confirm exports work by checking that dist/enums/AssetType.js (or .mjs) exists and matches the exports map in package.json.

title: Bump data-models to 1.1.1 and publish to npm with fixed dist exports
description:
attached_molecule: da-wisp-bfz
attached_at: 2026-02-15T19:49:37Z
attached_args: SKIP PLAN MODE. Implement directly. Bump version in package.json from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1. Run npm run build and confirm dist/enums/AssetType.js exists. Run npm test. Commit and push to main so GitHub Actions publishes to npm.
dispatched_by: mayor

npm 1.1.0 has broken dist (missing enums/AssetType). The fix from da-7kc rebuilt dist on main but never bumped version or republished. Bump version to 1.1.1 in package.json, commit, push to main. GitHub Actions OIDC trusted publishing will handle the npm publish. Verify: npm run build && npm test && ensure dist/enums/AssetType.js exists in build output.
